items.question: How can I prolong the life of my furniture?
items.answer: Where possible, we recommend storing your furniture indoors during winter (such as inside a shed or outbuilding) to protect it from any harsh weather. If this is not possible, we advise using a protective furniture cover and storing any cushions inside. Regular cleaning and proper care for specific materials like teak, polyrattan, or cushions will also extend durability.

items.question: How long does polyrattan furniture last?
items.answer: Polyrattan garden furniture can last as much as 20 years outdoors, even if left out all winter, with proper maintenance and protection from harsh weather.

items.question: Can I leave my polyrattan furniture outside during winter?
items.answer: While our polyrattan furniture sets can be kept outside all year, we would still advise you to store it indoors where possible, or cover it with a breathable cover in order to maintain the condition of your furniture for as long as possible. If covering your furniture, it is also a good idea to move it and clean the area underneath every few months in order to prevent any buildup of dirt.

items.question: How do I clean polyrattan garden furniture?
items.answer: Simply fill a bucket of lukewarm, soapy water and use a soft sponge or cloth to gently clean your furniture, before washing off any soap with cold water. Remove cushions before cleaning and do not use a pressure washer as this can damage the material. We do not recommend using any abrasive, chemical cleaning products on your furniture unless recommended by a professional.

items.question: Can I leave my cushions outside?
items.answer: Although using a furniture cover or outdoor storage box can provide a level of protection, we always recommend removing cushions and storing them indoors during the winter or any harsh weather spells in order to maintain their condition as well as possible.

items.question: Can I machine wash my cushions?
items.answer: We advise handwashing olefin cushions by rinsing them in a bowl of warm, soapy water and then a bowl of plain water. Machine washing is at the customer's discretion and would need to be done on a very gentle cycle to avoid the risk of shrinkage or distortion. MINT cannot accept responsibility for damage caused by machine washing cushions.

items.question: What happens if I spill something on my cushions?
items.answer: Spot clean any spillages by gently blotting the area with a clean cloth or sponge using lukewarm, soapy water. Avoid rubbing vigorously as this may spread the stain or damage the fabric. For stubborn stains, use a mild detergent suitable for outdoor fabrics, and rinse thoroughly with clean water afterward. Always test any cleaning solution on a small, inconspicuous area first.

items.question: When will my furniture be delivered?
items.answer: Many of our MINT Essentials collection is available for standard delivery within 5-10 working days. Other products (including all Limited Edition designs) are on pre-order and the delivery timeframe will be indicated on the product page.

items.question: Could my order be delayed?
items.answer: Any MINT Essentials products that are in stock for 5-10 day delivery are highly unlikely to be delayed, due to already being in the UK. OUR MINT DesignDrops have a despatch date listed on each individual product page. Delays typically do not occur at this point, as once the furniture is shipped, it is on its way to the UK and your home. In the unlikely event any delays do occur, we will notify you by email or phone.

items.question: Are there any postcodes you don't deliver to?
items.answer: Please note: In addition to the below postcodes, we are currently unable to deliver to any postcodes in Cornwall or Scotland due to increased demand. We hope to resume deliveries to these locations in the near future. Although we deliver to the majority of UK postcodes, there are a select number of postcodes that we are unfortunately not able to deliver to at this time. Please see the below list of postcodes we are not currently able to deliver to: AB31, AB32, AB33, AB34, AB35, AB36, AB37, AB38, AB41, AB42, AB43, AB44, AB45, AB55, AB56, IV1, IV2, IV3, IV4, IV5, IV6, IV7, IV8, IV9, IV10, IV11, IV12, IV13, IV14, IV15, IV16, IV17, IV18, IV19, IV20, IV21, IV22, IV23, IV24, IV25, IV26, IV27, IV28, IV30, IV31, IV32, IV33, IV34, IV35, IV36, IV40, IV41, IV42, IV43, IV44, IV45, IV46, IV47, IV48, IV49, IV51, IV52, IV53, IV54, IV55, IV56, IV63, IV99, PH15, PH16, PH17, PH18, PH19, PH20, PH21, PH22, PH23, PH24, PH25, PH26, PH30, PH31, PH32, PH33, PH34, PH35, PH36, PH37, PH38, PH39, PH40, PH41, PH42, PH43, PH44, PH49, PH50, KA27, KA28, PA20, PA21, PA22, PA23, PA24, PA25, PA26, PA27, PA28, PA29, PA30, PA31, PA32, PA33, PA34, PA35, PA36, PA37, PA38, PA39, PA41, PA42, PA43, PA44, PA45, PA46, PA47, PA48, PA49, PA60, PA61, PA62, PA63, PA64, PA65, PA66, PA67, PA68, PA69, PA70, PA71, PA72, PA73, PA74, PA75, PA76, PA77, PA78, PA79, PA80, KW1, KW2, KW3, KW5, KW6, KW7, KW8, KW9, KW10, KW11, KW12, KW13, KW14, KW15, KW16, KW17, HS1, HS2, HS3, HS4, HS5, HS6, HS7, HS8, HS9, ZE1, ZE2, ZE3, BT, GY, JE, IM. If your postcode is in this list and you've already placed an order, we'll contact you to discuss options.

items.question: What are the delivery options for MINT Essentials?
items.answer: MINT Essentials are delivered within 5-10 working days using standard curb-side delivery. Assembly is not included, but many items require minimal setup.

items.question: How does pre-order delivery work for Limited Edition designs?
items.answer: Limited Edition products are made-to-order with delivery in 6-10 weeks. You'll pay a 25% deposit upfront, with the balance due upon shipping. Track your order via our helpdesk.

items.question: Is assembly required for your furniture?
items.answer: Most of our outdoor furniture requires some assembly. We provide detailed instructions, and assembly service is available for £69.95 per product in select areas.

items.question: Do you offer assembly services?
items.answer: Yes, professional assembly is available for an additional fee of £69.95 per item. This can be selected during checkout for eligible postcodes.

items.question: Can I change or cancel my order?
items.answer: You can modify or cancel within 24 hours of placing your order. After that, changes may not be possible due to processing. Contact our team immediately if needed.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept major credit cards, PayPal, and financing options through partners. For pre-orders, a 25% deposit is required, with balance due before shipping.

items.question: What is your return policy?
items.answer: We offer a 14-day return window for unused items in original packaging. Returns are subject to a restocking fee, and customer arranges return shipping unless faulty.

items.question: How do I process a return?
items.answer: Contact our support team via the Order Helpdesk with your order number. We'll guide you through the process and provide return instructions if eligible.

items.question: What if my item arrives damaged?
items.answer: Inspect upon delivery and note any damage on the delivery note. Contact us within 48 hours with photos for a replacement or refund. We cover return shipping for faulty items.

items.question: What warranty do you offer?
items.answer: All products come with a 1-year structural guarantee. Materials like teak (5 years), aluminium (10 years), and olefin fabrics (3 years) have extended warranties. Covers manufacturing defects and degradation.

items.question: How do I claim under warranty?
items.answer: Contact support with your order number and photos of the issue. We'll assess and provide replacement parts or a full replacement if needed, free in the first year.

items.question: How do I care for teak furniture?
items.answer: Teak is naturally durable but benefits from annual sealing with teak oil. Clean with mild soap and water. It will naturally silver over time if left untreated, which is normal and doesn't affect quality.

items.question: What about aluminium furniture maintenance?
items.answer: Aluminium is low-maintenance and rust-proof. Clean with soapy water and a soft cloth. Avoid abrasive cleaners. Powder-coated finishes protect against UV fading for years.

items.question: How to maintain rattan furniture?
items.answer: Synthetic rattan is weather-resistant. Clean with mild soap and hose down. Store cushions indoors. Use covers during off-season to prevent dirt buildup.

items.question: Are your fabrics weatherproof?
items.answer: Yes, our olefin and polyester fabrics are water-resistant and UV-protected. They're quick-dry but should be stored indoors during prolonged rain or winter to maintain appearance.

items.question: Where is MINT Outdoor based?
items.answer: We are a UK-based company specializing in premium outdoor furniture, with warehouses in the UK for fast delivery.

items.question: Do you ship internationally?
items.answer: Currently, we deliver only to UK mainland addresses (with some postcode restrictions). International shipping is not available at this time.

items.question: Can I order swatches or samples?
items.answer: Yes, we offer free fabric swatches for cushions. Contact customer service with your request, and we'll mail them to you.

items.question: What makes your furniture sustainable?
items.answer: We use responsibly sourced materials like FSC-certified teak and recyclable aluminium. Our made-to-order model reduces waste, and we're working towards B Corp certification.

items.question: How do I track my order?
items.answer: Use our Order Helpdesk at mint-outdoor-support-cf235e896ea9.herokuapp.com/. Enter your order number for real-time status, delivery updates, and returns.
